function.name: deviceTemperatureSetting_setMin
function.description: This function is used to set the temperature of a SmartThings device to its minimum value.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the temperature to minimum.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment to set the temperature to minimum.
